author: Hannah (Sensational Sidekick)
title: *HOT* Kohl’s Cardholders: Magic Bullet Blending System Only $12.59 Shipped (Regularly $59.99)
text:
Need a blender? This *HOT* deal is back! Hop on over to Kohl’s.com where this Magic Bullet 11-piece Blending System is marked down to $19.99 (regularly $59.99)! Even sweeter, you’ll save an extra 10% off at checkout making the price just $17.99 in your cart – no promo code is needed as the discount will be automatically applied at checkout.
PLUS, through today only, Kohl’s cardholders can head to Kohls.com and score an extra 30% off with the code LOVE30 AND score free shipping with the code FEB4FREE – both codes can be used together!
Kohl’s Cardholders Deal: Magic Bullet 11-piece Blending System $19.99 (regularly $59.99)
Minus the automatic 10% off discount = $17.99
Enter the promo code LOVE30 (30% off)
Enter the promo code FEB4FREE (free shipping)
Final cost $12.59 shipped!
Not a cardholder? Through today, February 20th only, get an extra 15% off with the code QUICK at checkout or spend $100 or more and get 20% off with the promo code QUICK . Get free shipping with a $75+ purchase or choose free store pick-up if available.
This would be a great gift idea!
